text: Good evening.
I hope it was not too much trouble getting here.
May I take your coat?
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

options.label: Ok, we've definitely already met twice before.

text: Very good.
When you are ready to leave I will fetch it for you.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: If you so desire.
If you change your mind, you can find me here again later.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: You seem perhaps a little familiar, I admit.
Perhaps my old memory is failing me.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: There are hors-d'oeuvres on the table to my left, if you would like one.
The door to my right will take you into the mansion proper.
Please do not hesitate to find me if you need anything.
I hope you have a very rewarding evening.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Enter the door to my right when you are ready to join the party.
If you need anything, you can find me here again.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: There you are.
Please be aware: I am somewhat flustered.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: ...Yes.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Here is all the information I have.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: We last saw each other before that flash of light.
When I awoke, I was in the antechamber again.
Unperturbed, I went back in to track down our suspect.
However, the mansion seemed... different. As if everything had been moved around.
I tracked the suspect down, only to find another man claiming to be Omar Clean.
I tried to apprehend the Omar impersonator, but when I touched him I awoke in the antechamber again.
The mansion was different again.
I found another man claiming to be Omar Clean, and I suddenly found myself here.
Do you know why that is?
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

options.label: We're on a reality TV show!
You have a bad memory for house layouts!

text: That's not an unreasonable theory.
But I haven't found anything to support it.
It's too unlikely that I wouldn't have found something to indicate this by now.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: The mansion design, the furniture, the clothing -- it's always the same.
There would have been a noticeable difference by now if we were in a different time period.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Very good. We're in agreement, then.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Impossible. I have a photographic memory.
Please don't waste my time with theories like this.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Very well. I should have suspected.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Here is my theory...
The suspect seems to be using these Omars as a method of interdimensional travel.
Which, while empirically sound...
...is obviously a COMPLETELY insane theory!
Forgive me for that emotional outburst.
Now then. Look around for any clues as to where this universe's Omar is hiding.
Keep an eye out for our initial suspect.
Oh, and, uh, it's... good to see you again.
Forgive that outburst as well.
Go. Find clues. Goodbye.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Keep looking for any clue son our suspect, or our next Omar.
And please keep a level head.
Try not to think too much about the implications of interdimensional travel.
If you get scared, you're useless to me.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0
